auth_type.description: Auth method for your username/password; one of: [api user]

endpoint.description: Oncall endpoint to connect to, everything before '/api/v0' in the URL

password.description: Password to use when connecting to oncall

username.description: Username to use when connecting to oncall

auto_populate_days.description: How many days in advance to plan the schedule

role.description: Name of the role, one of [primary secondary shadow manager vacation unavailable]

roster_id.description: Roster ID (in team/roster format) to map this schedule to

scheduling_algorithim.description: Scheduling algorithim to use, one of: [default round-robin]

duration.description: How long this shift should be in duration shorthand, e.g. 24h, 8h, 1h30m, 3d

start_day_of_week.description: The day of week that this shift should start on

start_time.description: The time on this day that this shift should start

block.description: The various shifts that make up a rotation of this role

auto_populate_days.description: How many days in advance to plan the schedule

role.description: Name of the role, one of [primary secondary shadow manager vacation unavailable]

roster_id.description: Roster ID (in team/roster format) to map this schedule to

scheduling_algorithim.description: Scheduling algorithim to use, one of: [default round-robin]

start_day_of_week.description: Day of week to start the schedule one, one of: [Sunday Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday]

start_time.description: Start time of schedule in 24 hour time format, e.g. 13:15 for 1:15pm

members.description: List of usernames which should be added to the roster

name.description: Name of the roster, if blank will default to team name

team.description: Name of team this roster should be assigned to

admins.description: Authoritative list of usernames of who should admin the team

email.description: Email group for the entire team

iris_plan.description: Default iris plan for this team. Allows paging from oncall

name.description: Name of the team, acts as the ID as well

scheduling_timezone.description: Must be non-empty. Scheduling timezone of the team, should be one of values set in your oncall config -> supported_timezones : https://github.com/linkedin/oncall/blob/master/configs/config.yaml#L128-L137

slack_channel.description: Slack channel that this team should all be members of
